SuperstitioMod:SexualHeat.NAME: Pleasure
DESCRIPTIONS: Every accumulated #b%d Pleasure triggers an Orgasm. %s
Every accumulated #b%d Pleasure triggers an Orgasm. During Orgasm, you become Stunned. %s
NL In #yOrgasm, total Orgasms: #b%d.
Orgasm!
Back-to-back Orgasms!
The Pleasure fades...
Squirting!
Orgasm denied!

SuperstitioMod:InTurnSexualHeatNeededMod.NAME: Turn-Based Pleasure Modifier
DESCRIPTIONS: This turn, Pleasure needed for Orgasm is #rreduced by #b%d.
This turn, Pleasure needed for Orgasm is #gincreased by #b%d.

SuperstitioMod:RefractoryPeriod.NAME: Refractory Period
DESCRIPTIONS: Orgasm requires #b%d more Pleasure. If no #yOrgasm occurs before the end of next turn, this is removed.
Orgasm requires #b%d more Pleasure. If no #yOrgasm occurs this turn, this is removed.

SuperstitioMod:SexToy.NAME: Sex Toys
DESCRIPTIONS: At the start of each turn, every #b%d #ySex Toys grant #b1 point of #yPleasure. NL Current Sex Toys: %s
NL %s: #b%d;

MAKE_KEYWORDS.DESCRIPTION: At the start of each turn, #ySex Toys grant #yPleasure.

SuperstitioMod:ChokeChokerPower.NAME: Asphyxiation
DESCRIPTIONS: Pleasure required for Orgasm is reduced by #b%d. NL When entering #yOrgasm, lose #b%d HP.

MAKE_KEYWORDS.DESCRIPTION: Reduces #yPleasure required for #yOrgasm. NL When entering #yOrgasm, lose half your stacks as HP.

SuperstitioMod:SamsaraPower.NAME: Cycle of Desire
DESCRIPTIONS: Whenever you play a card, draw 1 card.

SuperstitioMod:TimeStopPower.NAME: Time Freeze
DESCRIPTIONS: Lasts for #b%d turn(s). Pleasure doesn't change this turn. NL At the end of turn, all your #ydebuffs and buffs are paused. NL At the start of your turn, all stored Pleasure is unleashed and multiplied by #b%d.

SuperstitioMod:DelaySexualHeat.NAME: Delayed Pleasure
DESCRIPTIONS: After drawing cards next turn, gain #b%d Pleasure.

SuperstitioMod:Overdraft.NAME: Overdraw
DESCRIPTIONS: At the start of your turn, exhaust #b%d cards.

SuperstitioMod:SexualDamage.NAME: Lust
DESCRIPTIONS: At the start of next turn, take #b%d damage.

MAKE_KEYWORDS.DESCRIPTION: Take damage at the start of next turn.
Aside from cards that directly apply #yLust, any #ySexual Damage that gets delayed also manifests as #yLust.

SuperstitioMod:FastWindUpPower.NAME: Quick Finish
DESCRIPTIONS: When you #yOrgasm, forcibly #ySatisfy #b%d time(s).

SuperstitioMod:DelayRemoveDelayHpLosePow.NAME: Afterglow
DESCRIPTIONS: At the start of your next turn, remove #b%d #rCorruption. NL Only removes Corruption gained between now and next turn.

SuperstitioMod:Milk.NAME: Milk
DESCRIPTIONS: After your next attack, grant the player %d #yTemporary HP.

MAKE_KEYWORDS.DESCRIPTION: After your next attack, grant the player #yTemporary HP.

SuperstitioMod:PlayerFlightPower.NAME: Slime Resilience
DESCRIPTIONS: Next #d attacks deal half damage.

MAKE_KEYWORDS.DESCRIPTION: Next attack received deals half damage.

SuperstitioMod:GetStrengthNextTurn.NAME: Delayed Strength
DESCRIPTIONS: At the start of next turn, gain %d Strength.
